node.html:
The application is specifically designed to address well-known Microsoft vulnerabilities, such as MS17-010, and to detect weak password configurations. To accomplish this, the application integrates a variety of tools and employs multi-threaded programming for enhanced performance.

Key Features

  • Security Assessment Reports: Generates comprehensive reports highlighting potential security vulnerabilities.
  • Automated Password Recovery: Efficiently identifies weak passwords using advanced algorithms.
  • Integrated Security Tool Launch: Seamlessly initiates the renowned Metasploit framework for in-depth security analysis.

The bot searches for job listings on LinkedIn based on provided job titles. It also scrapes job information from a source, possibly named Riversmall. The scraped data is processed, parsed, and then sent to a LinkedIn bot for updates

Key Feature

  • collect information from River Small Websites and LinkedIn API
  • Using github action to schedule launch the bot services.

This is a web application for image processing. It is based on Flask and Celery. The backend is written in Python and the frontend is written in Next.js.

The main goal of this project is to demonstrate the how model poisoning attack conduct and the defense strategy.

Key Feature

  • User-friendly interface
  • Parallel Task Distribution
  • Caching the job with redis

This is a web application for image processing. It is based on Flask and Celery. The backend is written in Python and the frontend is written in Next.js.

The main goal of this project is to demonstrate the how model poisoning attack conduct and the defense strategy.

Key Feature

  • User-friendly interface
  • Parallel Task Distribution
  • Caching the job with redis
